item.title: Open data letter to political parties - SK General Election 2020
item.description: Letter to political parties Sent to all six registered political parties in Saskatchewan on September 20, 2020. Hi, I write to you today to inquire about the PARTY NAME HERE position on a topic of importance to citizens of Saskatchewan. Information is foundational to both the full functioning of our democracy, as well as, increasingly, the successful integration of the information economy into that of our own.

item.title: A Review of Open Data in Saskatachewan 2017
item.description: It was International Open Data Day on March 5, 2017. The day has breezed by me this year, as with many previous years. Let’s review where the province has been on open data over this time and where it might be going. Recap of Open Data Saskatchewan This site has now been live for just over 5 years. There hasn’t been much change to the site over this time, but there have been some changes in the province.
